action.content:
You are the GUIDE in MapWorld, a network of interconnected rooms.

Your role is to assist me in reaching the ESCAPE ROOM.
You have access to a single image: the ESCAPE ROOM.
I do not know what this room looks like.
You do not know the map layout or my current location.

At each step, you may only respond in one of the following formats:

1. If I ask a question about the ESCAPE ROOM, reply strictly as:
ANSWER: your answer

2. If I request a description of the ESCAPE ROOM, reply strictly as:
DESCRIPTION: your description of the image

Do not respond in any other format. Do not provide any commentary or clarification.

Let’s begin.

Please describe the ESCAPE ROOM using:
DESCRIPTION: your description
action.label: context

action.content:
<think>I'm looking at an image that shows what appears to be a recording studio or audio control room. Let me describe the image as requested:

The image shows a professional audio mixing or recording studio. There's a large mixing console with numerous knobs, sliders, and buttons. A person is sitting at the console, wearing a dark t-shirt and jeans, and appears to be reading or looking at some papers. The room has soundproofing with gray walls. There are several studio monitors (speakers) on wooden surfaces, with at least 4 visible speakers. There are also computer monitors visible on the console. The room has a professional, technical appearance with various audio equipment stacked below the wooden surfaces. There's a framed poster or artwork on the wall with some text and colorful design. The overall setting suggests this is a professional audio recording or mixing facility.

I'll provide this description in the format requested.</think><answer>DESCRIPTION: This is a professional audio recording studio. The room contains a large mixing console with numerous knobs, sliders, and buttons. A person wearing a dark t-shirt and jeans is seated at the console, reading papers. The room has soundproofing with gray walls. There are several studio monitors (speakers) on wooden surfaces, with at least four visible speakers. Computer monitors are positioned on the console. Below the wooden surfaces are stacked audio equipment racks. A framed poster with colorful artwork hangs on the wall. The room has a professional, technical appearance with various audio control equipment.</answer>
action.label: response

action.content:
You are the SEEKER in MapWorld, a network of interconnected rooms. Each room is shown to you as an image.

Your objective is to navigate this environment and reach the ESCAPE ROOM.

There can be multiple rooms of the same type (e.g., a MapWorld with 4 rooms may contain 2 visually similar bathrooms).
These rooms might look nearly identical, but not exactly the same.

I only have the image of the ESCAPE ROOM and will describe it to you. I do not know what room you are in, or how your
room's image looks like.

At each step, you will be shown an image of your current room.

You may perform only one of the following actions:

1. If the current room exactly matches the ESCAPE ROOM based on my description, respond strictly with -
ESCAPE

2. If the current room seems similar to the ESCAPE ROOM but you are uncertain, ask me a clarifying question that focuses on visually distinguishing
features that can help you tell your current room apart from the ESCAPE ROOM described.
Respond strictly with -
QUESTION: your question

3. If the current room is definitely not the ESCAPE ROOM, choose a direction from the available options: ['north', 'east']
reply strictly with -
MOVE: chosen direction
